name: Glowstrike: Robot Obliteration
description: You're in a dark, enemy-filled universe, and your goal is to eliminate all the enemies on the map, in intense, colorful combat. On the terrain, you'll find helpers in the form of parcels (the parcels are represented as crates with a green ring around them). They'll be there to assist you in your laser battle. Packages contain speed boosts, automatic turrets... ). In the game, you can also change the graphics and video settings to optimize the experience.
